title: Beautiful views from your new 2 Bed, 2 Bath! 1064 Sq Ft!
posting_body: ['RENTAL INFO', 'Rental Rates:', '$1558/month', 'Location:', '100 Ashley Creek Cir Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'Unit for Rent:', '2-BR 2-BA |', 'Square Feet:', '1064 sq ft |', 'Lease Length:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES', '● Business Center', '● Clubhouse', '● Community Events', '● On Marta bus-line', '● Pet Care', '● Picnic Area', '● Playground', '● Tennis Court', '● Cardio & Fitness Center', '● Clothes Care Center', '● Electronic Rent Payment', '● Minutes to Stone Mountain park', '● On-Site Management', '● Package Receiving', '● Resort Style Swimming Pool', '● Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment Nearby', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '● Breakfast Bar', '● Cable Ready', '● Carpet', '● Dining Room', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Extra Storage', '● Range', '● Tub/Shower', '● Vinyl Flooring', '● Air Conditioning and Gas Heating', '● Brushed Nickel Lighting Package', '● Cozy Fireplaces', '● Huge Floorplans up to 1300 sq.', 'ft.', '● Newly Updated Apartments', '● Patio or Balcony', '● Roommate Floor Plans', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Washer & Dryer Connections', 'ADDITIONAL INFO', 'Description:', 'Welcome to Polo Club, beautiful two and three bedroom apartment homes designed for your comfort and convenience.', 'Polo Club provides residents private decks for those quiet times.', 'Our interior amenities will assure you that Polo Club is the choice for your new home.', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pets per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', '$15 monthly pet fee.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50 lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Polo Club Apartments:', 'show contact info', 'Equal Housing Opportunity.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'F6869CD7B37941A']
